01 中国艺术与中国美学的智慧
The Wisdom of Chinese Art and Chinese Aesthetics
彭吉象 PENG Jixiang 北京大学，北京 100871（Peking University，100871 Beijing）
摘要：中国艺术具有迥异于西方艺术的特殊形态，蕴含着中国优秀的传统文化。在当代语境下，中国艺术要走向世界，一方面要 运用现代的艺术语言；另一方面，要坚持自己独特的艺术精神。与西方艺术和西方美学强调美与真的统一不同，中国艺术与中国 美学更强调美与善的统一，这构成了中华民族的民族文化心理。儒家、道家、禅宗作为中国艺术与中国美学的思想基础，分别道 说了人与社会之和、人与自然之和、人与人心之和，构成了中国艺术与中国美学独特的智慧箴言。 关键词：中国艺术；中国美学；儒家；道家；禅宗 Abstract: Different from the western art, the Chinese art possesses a special form, which contains the excellent traditional culture of China. In the contemporary context, in order to turn out to the world, the Chinese art should not only make use of the modern artistic language, but also adhere to its own unique artistic spirit. Different from the unity of beauty and truth emphasized by the western art and aesthetics, Chinese art and aesthetic throw more emphasis on the unity of beauty and goodness, which constitutes the national culture psychology of the Chinese nation. As the ideological basis of the Chinese art and Chinese aesthetic, Confucianism, Taoism and Zen reveal the sum of man and society, man and nature, man and human heart respectively, which constitute the unique wisdom of Chinese art and Chinese aesthetics. Key words: Chinese art； Chinese aesthetics；Confucianism；Taoism；Zen 中图分类号：J01 文献标识码：A doi：10.3963/j.issn.2095-0705.2017.02.001（0001-06）

李卓 LI Zhuo 李雪 LI Xue 武汉理工大学，武汉 430070（Wuhan University of Technology，430070 Wuhan）
摘要：通过例举若干在现代设计史上具有代表性的优秀产品，从时间维、技术维等角度渐入性地剖析了系统原理在产品设计中的 运用方法，提出了现代产品设计已经逐渐脱离了原先以物理功能为主的诉求，而承载了传达使用体验和联结情感等非物质属性精 神功能的观点。从系统原理的视角剖析其背后秩序井然的设计逻辑，这根线索对于探究现代产品设计方式的创新极具启发——非 物载体的方式创新为探究工业设计的本质提供了新的研究思路，同时也为工业设计手段提供了更为广阔的发展空间。 关键词：非物质性；方式创新；产品设计；系统原理 Abstract: By enumerating several representative products during the modern design history, and progressively analyzing the application of the principles of system in product design from the dimensions of time and technology, this paper points out that the modern product design has been gradually separated away from the original demands of the physical function, and the idea of carrying out the immaterial function such as the user experience and the emotional connection. To analyze the backstage orderly design logic on the perspective of the principle of system is very enlightening to the exploration of the innovation of modern product design—— the innovative ways of immaterial carrier provides a new research idea to explore the nature of the industrial design and larger potential for the development of the means of industrial design. 李柏山 LI Baishan 成雪敏 CHENG Xuemin 怀化学院，湖南 怀化 418000(Huaihua University，418000 HuaiHua HuNan)
摘要：窗雕，在五溪流域各少数民族传统民居中作为重要的装饰装修纯手艺的表现手段，构筑象征、寓意、祈望传统的意匠特征。 贵州镇远付家大院的窗雕，利用质朴的木材料以及恰当运用雕刻技艺进行工艺加工，“晕染”出建筑风格与艺术形式协调与统一 的完美境界，有机地将宗教理念、民俗信仰、道德念、人生念和审美意识等附丽于其图形纹饰之中，传递出民族优秀传统文化与 艺术的信息。对具有传承性、地域性、互渗性的“窗雕”建筑装饰装修文化艺术的研究，对传承和弘扬民族优秀文化意义深刻。 关键词：付家大院；窗雕；图纹寓意 Abstract: Window carving is an important expression way of a pure craftsmanship of the traditional houses decoration of the minorities who live in the five-river catchments, building design features, traditional symbol and moral desire. The window carving of the Guizhou Fujia Courtyard uses simple wooden material and proper carving skills to "bloom" a perfection stage of the harmony and unity between the carved window architectural style and art form, which organically attaches the religious concepts, folk beliefs, moral concept, life concept, and aesthetic consciousness to its carved window graphics, passing out information of the excellent Chinese traditional culture and art. The study on the culture and art of "window decoration" possessing the inheritance, regional and mutual permeability is of great significance to inherit and carry forward the excellent national culture. Key words: Fu Jia Courtyard；window carving；meaning of the pattern

摘要：研究树形图案在中国民间美术样式中的隐喻意义，可探寻树形图案在中国民间民俗艺术中的特殊作用。结合民俗传统，以 民间艺术作品实例为切入点，探析树形图案在中国民间美术中的基本样式与隐喻意义，抽取艺术符号之下隐含着的民族化的艺术 思维与象征语言，可为现代设计提供借鉴。树形图案隐喻的多样性和文化延续性，对民间艺术研究及其现实运用具有重要意义。 关键词：树形图案；隐喻；中国民间美术；样式 Abstract: To analyze the metaphorical meaning of the tree pattern in the in Chinese folk art style can discover the special effect produced by a tree pattern in the folk art of China. Combined with folk tradition, taking examples of the folk art as the breakthrough point, analyzing the basic style and metaphorical meaning of the tree pattern in the Chinese folk art , and extracting the nationalized artistic thinking and symbolic language of the artistic symbols can provide references for the modern design. The diversity and cultural continuity of Tree pattern metaphor is of great significance to the study of folk art and its practical use. Key words: the tree pattern；metaphor；Chinese folk art；style

摘要：魏晋南北朝至唐代，是新型坐具大量传来，中原地区逐渐加以接受的转折时期，因此许多坐具的形制和称谓都处在产生、分化、 转换的过程当中。绳床在唐代及其以前的文献中仅载其名，未见有文献专门描述其具体形制、种类，这造成宋代以后学界产生不 少争议。绳床作为中国早期高型坐具的代表，对传统坐具的设计体系产生过重大影响，有深入探究的必要。本文以历史文献及相 关图像资料为依据，考论魏晋南北朝至唐代绳床的形制及其演变发展。 关键词：绳床；早期高型坐具；坐具形制；高坐家具 Abstract: From the Wei, Jin and Southern and Northern Dynasties to the Tang Dynasty is a period of change when large number of new seats came into the Central Plains region and were gradually accepted by the people of the area. Therefore, so many of the shapes and titles of the seats are in the process of production, change, and diverging from their original forms. The records of the Rope Bed from the Tang Dynasty and before only covered its name, but no specific description on its structure and categories, which created many controversies in this field after the Song Dynasty. It is necessary to explore the Rope Bed since it is an important representation of China's early high-footed seats which has a significant impact on the traditional design systems of seats. Based on the historical records and related image datas, this paper examines the shapes and evolution of the Rope Bed from the Wei, Jin and Southern and Northern Dynasties to the Tang Dynasty. Key words: rope bed；early high-footed seats；seat shape；high-seat furniture

07 设计方法论的构成谱系 *
The Composition Pedigree of the Design Methodology
张黔 ZHANG Qian 武汉理工大学，武汉 430070（Wuhan University of Technology，430070 Wuhan）
摘要：国内设计学界已经开始尝试建立设计哲学和设计方法论，但尚未建构出设计方法论的谱系。设计方法论的理论基础是当代 价值哲学。设计方法论可定义为围绕价值目标的实现对设计活动进行研究的学科。设计方法论可分为设计认识论、设计伦理学和 设计美学这 3 个方面，分别对应着设计活动中的真、善、美这 3 种人类基本价值目标。 关键词：设计方法论；价值谱系；设计认识论；设计伦理学；设计美学 Abstract: The domestic design academia has begun to try to establish a philosophy and methodology of design, but have not yet constructed a pedigree of design methodology. The theoretical basis of design methodology is contemporary philosophy of value. Design methodology can be defined as a discipline that studies the design activities centered on the realization of value goals. It can be divided into three aspects: design epistemology, design ethics and design aesthetics, which correspond to three basic values of humankind including truth, good and beauty in design activities. Key words: design methodology；value pedigree；design epistemology；design ethics；design aesthetics

08 垂直社交产品的内容选择研究
Content Selection of Vertical Social Products
张完硕 JANG Wansok 刘丽珺 LIU Lijun 武汉理工大学，武汉 430070 （Wuhan University of Technology，430070 Wuhan）
摘要：在社交产品垂直化已经成为社交产品全新发展模式的背景下，通过对垂直社交产品的现状以及目前典型热门垂直社交产品 案例的分析，认为垂直社交产品在内容选择方面，需要在制定聚焦主题的同时找寻市场的空白点，尽可能挖掘用户更深层次的需求， 并确保选择的内容具有更强的用户粘性。同时，可以运用“共享”的概念赋予产品社交的场景属性，来提高垂直社交产品的社交 质量并获取一定的文化价值。另外，可以使产品内容与离线商务模式相结合，以创造垂直社交产品更大的市场价值。 关键词：垂直社交；内容选择；社交产品 Abstract: Under the background that social product verticalization has become the brand new development mode of social product, by means of analyzing the status of vertical social product and current typical vertical social product, it is believed that, the content selection of vertical social product should look for market blank while formulating the focus, strive to excavate users’ demands in deeper hierarchy, and guarantee stronger user viscosity of selected content. Meanwhile, it is available to endow product with social scene attributed by using “sharing” concept to enhance the social quality of vertical social product and obtain certain cultural value. In addition, it is recommended to combine product content with offline business model so as to create higher market value of vertical social product. 09 设计师品牌的兴起、成因和意义 *
Formation, Cause and Significance of Designer Brand
李伍清 LI Wuqing 施妍 SHI Yan 杭州电子科技大学，杭州 310018（Hangzhou University of Electronic Science，310018 Hangzhou）
摘要：设计师品牌在我国正逐渐兴起，但在实践中存在认知的片面性问题。将设计师品牌兴起的内在成因归纳为 5 个方面：从差 异产品到审美独立；从符号象征到文化资本；从品味代理到碎片连接；从自主状态到生活方式；从设计主体到共同体关系。以此 为视角进行系统梳理，认为设计师品牌作为多样性的关系媒介，为设计者和使用者之间营造了一种“共同体”关系。因此，设计 师品牌发展的意义，不仅在于经济目标，而且具有创新供给和营造本土生活方式的多层次的社会意义。 关键词：设计师品牌；独立设计；设计文化；共同体；设计管理 Abstract: Designer brand is gradually rising in China, but involved in a one-sided problem of understanding in practice. In this paper, the internal causes of the rise of designer brands can be summarized into five aspects: from differentiated products to aesthetic independence; from symbolic signs to cultural capital; from taste agent to fragments connection; from autonomous state to life style; form design agents to community relation. System carding is carried out in this paper from this angle to think the designer brand as a medium of diversity which creates a "community" relationship between designers and users. The significance of its development lies not only in the economic goals, but also in the multi-layered social significance of the innovation supply and the construction of the local life style. 何星池 HE Xingchi 杭州电子科技大学，杭州 310000（Hangzhou Dianzi University，310000 Hangzhou ）
摘要：品牌识别作为企业传播自身信念、区别他者的主要核心外在表现，随着时代的发展在不断地以新的视角和新的面貌呈现给 消费者。当今时代科技文化高速发展，这给企业的品牌识别带来了新的意义与新的挑战。信息情报的洪流使得消费者的生活方式 与生存方略均有所转变，或者说消费者不再轻易相信企业的片面之词。因此，以文化传播趋势的视觉，阐述企业的品牌传达方式 由单一贯式思维转向可变式品牌识别的时代意义。 关键词：新媒体；可变式品牌；设计管理；文化创意；传播趋势 Abstract: Brand identity, as a representation of a company’s own beliefs and its differentiation from other competitors, is presenting a new perspective and look to customers with the development of the times. This rapid development of science, technology and culture of our times brings new meanings and new challenges to brand identity. Nowadays, the flood of information have changed customers’ lifestyles and consuming habits; in other words they no longer easily believe in any company’s one-sided promotion. Therefore, from the perspective of cultural transmission trend, this paper claims the time significance of brand’s expressional ways transferring from the simplex old-styled thinking to flexible brand identity. 王华斌 WANG Huabin 陈国彪 CHEN Guobiao 2 1,2 1. 武汉理工大学，武汉 430070（Wuhan University of Technology，430070 Wuhan） 2. 华南理工大学，广州 510640（South China University of Technology，510640 Guangzhou）
摘要：通过研究增强国人体质的路径，挖掘国人体质增强研究与设计创新之间的内在联系，结合案例阐述设计创新在有效增强国 人体质中所发挥的作用。提出通过设计整合周边资源，系统解决问题，遵循国人体质增强研究相关原则，构建以用户为中心模 型，根据用户需求，进行太极拳教练手环产品研发，使设计创新真正应用于增强国人体质的具体路径之中。 关键词：国人体质；太极拳教练手环；用户需求；设计创新；产品研发 Abstract: This article studies the path of Chinese people’s health enhancement, including its inner relation to design innovation and the related product research and development. Case study is applied to illustrate the effect of design innovation on the health enhancement. A model built around users is established to integrate peripheral resources to solve problems systematically. The customers’ need is clarified. The taichi coach hand band is under research and development for the application of this path. Key words: Chinese people’s health enhancement；taichi coach hand band；customer need；design innovation；product development

摘要：近年来，随着移动互联网的深度渗透，线上的人口红利正逐步缩减，增强现实技术的迅速发展让大众看到了新一代流量和 场景入口。多媒体互动项目的迅速兴起，使数字科技与艺术设计的融合逐渐形成一种新趋势。这二者之间的完美结合不仅带来了 无限可能，为电视节目制作提供了文化延伸以及重新思考创作的机会。在介绍增强现实技术原理的基础上，对其发展现状和应用 范围进行了初步探讨。同时，列举了当前电视媒体中利用此项技术原理的实际案例，继而分析了该技术基于视听互动体验的内在 规律，强调其对于丰富电视视觉语言的重要性，最后从宏观角度上预测了今后的发展动态与趋势，倡议电视节目以“三方互动” 的传播方式来突破原有的时空限制。 关键词：增强现实；电视节目；互动体验 Abstract: In recent years, with the popularization of the internet, online demographic dividend has been gradually reduced. People can see a new generation of data and scene because of the rapid development of augmented reality. The multimedia interaction is developing by leaps and bounds. It is shown that the integration of digital technology and art design has become a new trend. It provides endless possibilities with the combination of the two things, but also culture extension and chances or rethinking and recreating. Based on it, this paper introduces the principle of augmented reality in details, and it discusses the present status. At the same time, cases of current domestic television programs designing are analyzed. It emphasizes the importance of enriching the television program. In the end, it analyses the predictions of its developments and trends in macro view, the article advocates a kind of“ripartite interaction”which can break the limitation of space-time. Key words: augmented reality；TV program；interactive experience

Chinese posters are quietly sprouting on the basis of traditional Chinese New Year paintings. With the change of the times, in the late Qing Dynasty and the early Republic of China's enlightenment, the New Year’s painting has undergone a functional and technical change. Then the government of the Republic of China used the modified New Year paintings as a propaganda tool, which has improved New Year paintings and made it possible for mass production. By then, the improvement of the New Year paintings contained the connotation of public welfare posters. 16 服装设计中的实验性表达
On the Experimental Expression in Costume Design
孟君 MENG Jun 四川文理学院，达州 635000（Sichuan University，635000 Dazhou）
摘要：物质生活日渐丰富，人们对于服装的需要不再仅仅停留在实用层面，而是更加看重服装的精神价值。对于服装设计作品精 神价值的追求正是当代服装设计的一大特点。而实验性则是实现当代服装设计精神价值和艺术性的重要方法。本论文从服装设计 的设计主题、表达媒介、展示方式三个方面分析了当代服装设计创作的实验性，认为实验性有利于服装设计实现对于精神价值探索， 有利于提高服装设计的艺术性。 关键词：服装设计；实验性表达；艺术性 Abstract: Due to the rich material life in modern days, people are no longer satisfied with just the practical level, but more on spiritual value of clothing. For fashion design work the pursuit of spiritual value is an important characteristic of contemporary fashion design. Experimental expression is implementation of the important methods for contemporary costume design and artistic spirit value., From the design of clothing design theme, medium of expression, the paper displays the three aspects of experimental analysis of the contemporary fashion design. Experimental expression is good for realizing spiritual values in costume design and for improving the art of costume design. 2 桂宇晖 GUI Yuhui 胡羽佳 HU Yujia 1 1. 中国地质大学（武汉）艺术与传媒学院，武汉（China University Geosciences， Wuhan） 2. 华中师范大学美术学院，武汉 430079（Central China Normal University，430079 Wuhan）
摘要：人的自然感受分先天习得与后天学习获得，皆源于千百万年进化中形成中的自然感受。交互设计是研究“人”、引导技术、 形成人机共同行为的过程，于此过程中，满足和创造人的自然感受，实现自然而然的信息交流。包豪斯提出设计的核心问题是研 究人与社会的本质问题，两者具有相通性，却长期被设计研究者忽视。本文提出：联系传统设计思想，面向未来，交互设计给教 育提出了一个永恒的课题：研究人的本体性问题如何在设计教育中得以实现？其一，艺术设计教学永远贯穿在实践之中，今天如 何实践？其二，新的风格是面临新情况的调整还是全面的更改？其三，人工智能和大数据等依靠现有的数据分析可以完成获得的 结果如何满足自然交互设计的要求，甚至有反转回某一风格的可能？基于上述三点，本文认为：新媒体的交互与互感，现在的交 互设计，走向了以释放技术弹出数据、探究数据挖掘的机器为主的一个纯技术误区，这个误区，忽略了交互是以人的感受为基础 这一根本。自然交互方式在真正的人工智能实现之前提供了现阶段较合适的解决方案，具有生命活力的互动，让有限智能产品的 优势可以发挥到最大，局部的替代人完成人与机器之间的交流，尤为重要的是，自然交互方式的构思在与现实发生联系中，产生 了新的具有吸引力的交互行为，拓展交互艺术的疆域。 关键词：包豪斯；交互设计；自然交互；设计教育 Abstract: The value of interaction design is guiding people's behavior with technology, meeting people's needs, and achieving a natural ideal state. Bauhaus has not only solved the problem of modern design teaching even though this problem cannot be completely resolved, but Bauhaus proposed the core of design is studying the ontological problem of people and society. It presents an eternal topic through ancient design ideas to the future of interactive design. First, the teaching of art design always runs through in practice. Second, the new style is often faced with a new situation adjustment rather than a comprehensive change. Third, it even has a possibility to reverse a certain style: there is a new media interaction and mutual inductance. But now the interaction design is walking into a misunderstanding of a purely technical error that focuses on releasing the technology to explore the data mining. It ignores that the interaction is based on the human mind. The human feeling is a natural experience which is formed from the evolution in thousands of years. The result can be achieved in artificial intelligence and big data, which are relying on the existing data analysis, is far from meeting the requirements of natural interaction design. Natural interaction is a better solution at the present stage before the real artificial intelligence is realized with the vitality of the interaction, so that the advantages of limited intelligent products can be exerted to maximum with local replacement of people to complete the communication between people and machines. It is particularly important that the idea of natural interaction creates a new and engaging behavior in connection with reality. It exposes the boundaries of interaction art. 18 高校环境艺术设计专业引入地方元素的教学探索
Teaching Innovation Introducing Local Cultural Elements into University Environmental Art Design Education
龚敏 GONG Min 贵州师范大学，贵阳 550001（Guizhou Normal University，550001 Guiyang）
摘要：环境艺术设计是一门融合了不同专业学术内涵、集技术与艺术为一体的应用型、实践型的综合性学科。针对环境艺术设计 专业传统教学模式的分析与思考，结合社会发展对人才培养目标的需求，探索在传统教学体系基础上适宜性地引入地方民族文化 艺术元素，推动各地区综合性高校环境艺术设计专业课程体系的创新与发展。 关键词：环境艺术设计；地方民族文化；艺术元素；课程改革；教学创新 Abstract: Environmental art design is a comprehensive discipline of application and practice, which fuses different specialties academic connotation and integration of technology and art. By analyzing and thinking about the traditional teaching mode of environmental art design in this paper, combined with social development needs of talent training objectives, it tries to explore on the basis of the traditional teaching system leading into the introduction of local ethnic, cultural and artistic elements, to promote the innovation and development of the curriculum system of environmental art design in universities. Key words: environmental art design；local culture; art elements；curriculum reform；teaching innovation 中图分类号：J0-05 文献标识码：A doi：10.3963/j.issn.2095-0705.2017.02.018（0100-07）

在多年的办学经验中，各大综合性院校逐 题材。在环境艺术设计专业基础课程训练中，可 渐形成了较为系统的三段式教学模式（即专业基 以通过抽取地方民族文化中的要素，如建筑、刺 础、专业设计和教学实践），然而，在大数据时 绣（见图1、图2）、蜡染（见图3）、编织、漆艺 代背景下，人们对环境艺术设计专业的认知水平 等，将地方民族文化与艺术中的形体、线条、色 在不断提升，综合性院校传统的教学模式已经无 彩等元素巧妙地进行重构训练，使其转化为基础 法满足社会对该类人才培养目标的需求，亟待在 设计语言，从而改变陈旧、呆板的课程内容。 传统教学模式基础上，制订符合地方文化和经济 特色的人才培养计划。 传承优秀传统文化和注入民族复兴内容， 是当前全国各级政府为之奋斗的目标。由中共中 央办公厅、国务院办公厅印发的《关于实施中华 优秀传统文化传承发展工程的意见》中，指出要 把优秀传统文化全方位“贯穿国民教育始终”， “推进职业院校民族文化传承与创新示范专业点 [1] 建设”等指导方针 。如何将国家指导性政策与 高校人才培养，以及地方实际需求更好地融合， 是高校当前亟待解决的难题。 笔者通过多年教学的摸索与实践，认为在综 图 1 贵州苗族破线绣 ① 合性高校环境艺术设计专业各阶段教学中，适宜 性地引入地方民族文化元素，逐渐形成自己的特 色专业与特色教育，将是综合性高校环境艺术设 计专业课程体系上的创新与发展，也是具有前瞻 性的思考与探索。
二、基础课程教学结构体系中引入地 方民族文化符号元素

On the Appearance Design of Double-layer Anti-scald Electric Water Heater
胡晓涛 1,2 HU Xiaotao 1. 广东海洋大学，湛江 524000（Guangdong ocean university，524000 Zhanjiang ） 2. 中国传媒大学，北京 100024（Communication University of China，100024 Beijing）
摘要：为满足企业的新产品开发需要，对双层防烫电热水壶进行设计分析，明确其设计目标和定位。运用人机工程学的相关原理 和方法，确定了产品的关键部位尺寸。结合用户体验原理，对产品的功能、外观、色彩进行了人性化的设计。制作了1:1产品泡沫 模型，在此基础上完善了细部造型，验证了外观设计效果和结构设计的可行性，并进一步完成了产品结构设计。设计结果表明， 外观设计整体时尚、简洁大方，从用户的角度对产品功能进行了细致周到的考虑，符合市场和企业定位。为热水壶相关产品的开 发设计，提供了设计流程和设计方法方面的参考。 关键词：工业设计；双层防烫热水壶；人机工程；产品尺寸；人性化 Abstract: In order to meet company’s new product development need, the double-layer anti-scald electric water heater was analyzed in depth, so the design objective was determined. The product’s key dimension was confirmed by using principle of ergonomics. Combined with user experience theory, The product’s function, appearance and color were redesigned. Then a 1:1 foam model was made to test the effect of appearance design and the feasibility of structure design. The design results show that the appearance design is simple and fashion, and meets the market and company’s demands. The results are worthy for reference in designing Other similar products. Key words: industrial design；appearance of double-layer anti-scald electric water heater；human engineering；product dimension； humanization

此次设计的陶瓷果盘，既不只考虑实用功能，也不只追 现今，大家对旅行似乎情有独钟。在旅行中最多的可能是 求纯粹的审美功能，而是以实用和审美双重需要为目的。 玩和吃，而喝茶品茶这种文化也不应该被我们遗忘。当爬 以兰花为设计元素，根据花瓣的线条进行变形设计而成， 到山顶享受这大自然的魅力之时，喝上一小杯茶，此时， 流线形的花瓣外形给人一种素雅、端庄、清新的感觉。 我们的心情会更加美妙。我们设计的这套旅行茶具，能让 旅行更加美好。

1. 《五色土便携茶具》随手泡系列 铜奖 作者：翟亚博 紫砂材料最适宜茶性的发挥并富有丰富的人文内涵。这套茶具具有良好的便携性。色彩运用低纯度“撞色”的组合方式， 符合年轻人的审美偏好，又很好地表现出紫砂泥（又名“五色土”）的材料美感。
2. 《始源》文房系列 铜奖 作者：蒋雍君 张正中 作品将无往不在的客观实体——流水作为创作元素，运用泥片围接的工艺手法制作而成，将紫砂陶的功能效用与艺 术审美融合在一起。作品以六件为一组，材质为紫砂段泥，1170℃还原焰烧成。

3. 《扬州慢》酒店陶瓷餐具 铜奖
作者：余剑锋 吴迪涛 俞晓雯 《扬州慢》酒店餐具设计灵感来源于园林建筑、古街以及画舫船，透过陶瓷这样的载体来诠释淮扬文化。色彩装饰以古建筑粉墙黛瓦的黑 白色为主，同时点缀金边，使得餐具低调奢华。
4. 《圆润有度》茶具设计 铜奖 作者：熊菁菁 戴清材 该茶具设计以圆球为主体，在圆形基础上进行推敲设计，选择圆形的目的是遵循水的环柔曲径性，在抓握使用的时候也非常符合人体工程 学。在制作过程中运用了景德镇传统的拉胚工艺，采用高白泥作原料，这样才会让影青釉的质感更加剔透。用红木做一些按钮和把手的镶 嵌，这样在视觉上也产生了很好的节奏美，包括按钮、把手形状的设计也进行了尺度的考究，争取做到圆润有度。
